title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Linea stands out as a Layer 2 solution for Ethereum, leveraging zkEVM technology. It boasts a team with considerable expertise hailing from ConsenSys, the parent company behind significant products such as the Metamask wallet and Infura.In their latest roadmap, Linea has articulated their commitment to Decentralized Governance. This entails a shift towards a decentralized governance model, which prominently features the introduction of a native token.The prerequisites for ensuring eligibility for Linea Airdrop rewards align closely with the standard criteria applied by other Layer 2 solutions:Transfer funds into the Linea Network, with a recommended minimum of 1 ETH. There is no upper limit, so participation is not restricted to those with 10 ETH or more.Execute at least 50 transactions across three distinct months, each with a cumulative volume of $10,000 or more.Maintain a minimum liquidity pool of $1,000.Achieve a minimum of 20 points on Gitcoin Passport.More in our article!Learn more in our article ðŸ‘‰ Linea Airdrop Breakdown

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: An article about speculation for criteria to be eligible for by the airdrop hunters. There's nothing concrete about line token airdrop. It's just a common thing. I don't take it seriously. Even some criteria make any sense, but we are still far away to see linea airdrop to come soon. There have been various articles that were posting the different metrics to be eligible for airdrops. Just to transactions regularly and it will enough to make you eligible. Being active in the network is a key to be eligible for airdrop once it will happen. The only linea team and god knew what real metrics for the token airdrop if that will be going to happen.
